visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a polar column chart with an inverted axis. The chart should have a title 'Pane's innerSize' and a subtitle 'The innerSize option is set to 15%'. The chart should have a custom pane configuration with start and end angles, size, and inner size. The x-axis should be of type category with no line, and the y-axis should range from 0 to 225 with no line and show the last label. The data series should include one series with the data [29, 106, 144, 135, 216, 95].

subtitle.text: The innerSize option is set to 15%

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a polar column chart with an inverted axis. The chart is titled 'Pane's innerSize' and includes a subtitle explaining the innerSize setting. The pane configuration defines the chart's angular range and size, with an inner size set to 15%. The x-axis is configured as a category axis without a line, and the y-axis ranges from 0 to 225, also without a line, but showing the last label. The data series includes one set of data points [29, 106, 144, 135, 216, 95], which will be displayed as columns in the polar chart. Additional configurations include setting the chart's top margin to 40 pixels.
